title: Not worth giving a star !! 😠😠
comment: The worst app I've ever used! Doesn't seem to recognise the mnemonics assigned while signing up my account!

title: Haven't received any of my deposits
comment: It's slow as can be not to mention I haven't received any of my deposits sense the 17 several btc unaccounted for

title: Not able to sign in anymore
comment: Initially was not able to send coins, now can't even log in...

title: F**k
comment: Total bulls#it don't use this

title: Poor support
comment: The strange authentication problems and the slow speed would have been tolerable if at least someone would respond on time when e-mailing the support.

title: Not working well on Android
comment: Disappointed with this.  The app just doesn't run well on my phone.  I had to use the website to get the funds moved to another wallet, which was also disappointing since i was forced to pay the network fees to move the funds.   0.15 for 28 bucks.  boooo

title: Can not register
comment: Gives me mnemonic but does not go to step 3,says "cannot login" and nothing

title: Still good
comment: Still my go-to bitcoin wallet. Love the mneumonic passphrase encryption/backup combo. Backup from passphrase on any device.

title: Required for Greenbits extra settings.
comment: I would like to configure settings because Greenbits uses this for them but I can't successfully create a wallet it always says login failed after continuing from the passphrase.

title: I cant sign in on my phone
comment: downloaded the app and nothings goin great. cant sign in with the mnemno pasword stuff...always stops at 100% and freezes. HELP ME HERE

title: Best HD wallet
comment: GreenAddress is the best bitcoin wallet available at the moment. It uses a hierarchical deterministic seed to generate wallet addresses, utilizes multisig and nTimeLock for security with lots of 2fa options. This is the best wallet!

title: Crashes all times
comment: Simply speaking, it doesn't work at all: it always crashes at startup

title: Crashed. Repeatedly.
comment: Never even managed to get it open.

title: Crash
comment: It is crashing at startup every time.

title: freezes
comment: app freezes up a lot on android and iOS. the website works fine on PC.

title: The app crash
comment: After few months working well this wallet can't run. I have to use the PC version to get my bitcoins.
Fantastic
Way too buggy
Sending does not work properly

title: Doesn't work
comment: Accepts incoming bit coins but won't let me send any. So I've got bit coins now I can't do anything with. Galaxy S3

title: GreenAddress is great, app is not.
comment: But they are working on a native app.
Useful

title: Lots of potential but not ready
comment: Lots of potential but the app is just a webpage wrapper. The UI is horrible, especially on a small phone screen. Lots of issues logging in with pins

title: Lots of potential
comment: The security features are great! But usually when I enter my pin to log in to the app, the app never loads. Also, I don't like the ui. Can we get something more like mycelium instead of what feels like a mobile webpage?

title: Love it
comment: This is a great wallet and a super service. Very active development keeps it getting better all the time.

title: Thanks
comment: Thanks for adding Thai and backup options! Super wallet and great developers.

title: Nice security
comment: Works great!

title: Best technology out there
comment: This is the best wallet so far. It's usability is improving day to day.

title: Revolutionary
comment: This is the first and only wallet that actually makes your funds harder to steal. Multiple means an attacker would have to compromise both the service and your device to spend them. nLockTime transactions mean you can move your coins in the future even if you no longer trust the service or it doesn't exist.

title: Getting better! Best around!
comment: Great security model. Animations and speed have been drastically improved. Still random graphical glitches sometimes, but this is my Android wallet now. Love the spending limits!

title: The most secure wallet
comment: The most secure wallet with an impressive user experience. And it keeps improving!

title: Lots of features! Slow.
comment: The app has lots of cool features but it's kind of slow. The list of transactions is not displayed, always empty.
Really slow

title: Greatly improved performance with latest update
comment: This Bitcoin wallet is rapidly becoming my favourite, as the latest update has dramatically improved the speed of signing in, and the UI is beautiful. Well done devs!

title: Great support and smooth system.
comment: Love all the security features as well as their multi sig architecture.    They also respond to support emails very quickly.

title: Great Application!
comment: 5 stars for concept, 4 stars for app (it is sluggish at times). Seeing this app work on my friend's phone was a contributing factor in me upgrading to a Motorola G (my old Defy XT was too old and incompatible). I am happy for my decision, and the phone upgrade has already paid for itself as far as I am concerned! Thank you to the devs for the secure mobile web wallet!

title: Great improved wallet
comment: Still has some little flaws, but the main concept is already great and working

title: The Bitcoin wallet evolved.
comment: Perfect balance between uncompromising security and nearly seamless usability and convenience for daily use.

title: It's the missing wallet
comment: It has many innovative features and it improves your security with two factor.

title: Great potential
comment: I love the concept. Execution is almost perfect. There are still some incomplete features but it'll take time. I wish the app can load a little faster on Android though.

title: Great app and sevice
comment: Moved to GreenAddress from BlockChain, looking really good!

title: What was missing
comment: This is exactly what I was looking for. Best concept/idea. It was already few months that people wanted this on reddit bitcoin forum, and now we have it!!!! Well done!
